name: signalsjs
description: Signal library for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.compileweb: rimraf dist/* && browserify index.js --debug --standalone signals | exorcist dist/signals.js.map > dist/signals.js
scripts.minifyweb: uglifyjs --compress --mangle --comments --in-source-map dist/signals.js.map --source-map dist/signals.min.js.map --source-map-url signals.min.js.map -o dist/signals.min.js -- dist/signals.js
